attributes.additional_details:
This petition is for anyone willing to support the building/creation of a new skatepark in Dover, Kent.

The current skate park Dover has is far to overpopulated and is not being looked after, we need a step in the right direction to get the council to stop wasting money and time painting the existing ramps and put their funds into a new skatepark/community area.

Please get all of your family and friends to sign the petition, we really need all the support we can get and any support we get will be appreciated!
